did.unittitle: American Federation of Teachers, Local 2067 Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: American Federation of Teachers. Local 2067 (Pittsburgh, Pa.)

did.abstract: American Federation of Teachers Local 2067 represents full-time and part-time faculty at the Community College of Allegheny County in Pittsburgh, Pa. This collection contains information regarding Local 2067 and its interactions with CCAC.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Harry E. Leas in 1981.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series II. American Federation of Teachers
Series IV. American Federation of Teachers, Local 2067

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: American Federation of Teachers, Local 2067 represents full-time and part-time faculty at the Community College of Allegheny County in Pittsburgh, Pa. The local was certified in 1971 as the bargaining agent for professors and technicians at CCAC. In addition to determining details on curriculum and salary rates, the union also provided input regarding administrative matters and searches for new school presidents.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: American Federation of Teachers, Local 2067 Records, 1966-1980, AIS.1981.15, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: American Federation of Teachers, Local 2067 Records, 1966-1980, AIS.1981.15, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Archives Service Center staff.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This collection contains information regarding Local 2067 and its interactions with the Community College of Allegheny County. Included are records about contract negotiations, as well as research about other faculty unions throughout the country.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: American Federation of Teachers Local 2340 Records, 1971-1983, AIS.1983.23, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System
American Federation of Teachers Local 2097 Records, 1970-1982, AIS.1983.03, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

controlaccess.corpname: American Federation of Teachers. Local 2067 (Pittsburgh, Pa.)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series contains research regarding teachers and education. Also included are documents about several conferences and groups concerned with educators and labor unions.

did.unittitle: Center for the Study of Collective Bargaining: Evaluations Material
AAUP Academic Freedom Guidelines and Budget Lobby

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series contains information about the American Federation of Teachers and their locals in Pennsylvania. Included are records from the AFT council in southwestern Pennsylvania, as well as locals in the Philadelphia area. Also present is information regarding the Pennsylvania Federation of Teachers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series includes research regarding contracts between universities and colleges and faculty unions. Parts of or entire union contracts with colleges are present, as well as files on each issue addressed in Local 2067's own contract with CCAC.

American Federation of Teachers, Local 2067 at the Community College of Allegheny County

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series includes records concerning the activities of Local 2067. Included are newsletters and member lists. Election materials and mailings are also present.

did.unittitle: Faculty Age, Sex, Race and Salary

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series contains information about CCAC. Included are questionaires, reports, and minutes that provide samples of the concerns teachers, students, and administration were addressing during the 1970s.
